challenges.description: Skills: Data Analysis · Business Intelligence · Big data · Estrategia empresarial · Business Strategy · Data Visualization · Project Management · Python · Tableau · SQL · Liderazgo de equipos · Zoho · Herramientas de inteligencia de negocios · Extraer, transformar, cargar (ETL) · Modelado de datos · Gestión de datos · Integración de datos · Planificación de recursos empresariales (ERP) · Gestión de relaciones con atención al cliente (CRM) · Gobierno de datos · Calidad de datos · Análisis de datos · Google Cloud Platform (GCP) · Data Governance

Involved from the beginning of the project, I was the person responsible for creating the new analytical model, defining dashboards and metrics. 
In an international environment and working with C-Level, Managing directors and Senior Managers, the new analytical model is the way in which the company measures the KPIs and OKRs.
Managing the tools that work as data sources for the KPIs was also important to control data quality. Furthermore, in some cases, some modifications in the ERP were made to gather better data to get more metrics.

Main responsibilities:
- As responsible for in-house analytics and reporting: I help managers, directors and C-Level to meet the most suitable KPIs and reports that help them in their daily work. 
- I created the data model from the beginning and developed the ETL and the dashboards.
- I managed the data model and the different integrations between the different information systems of the company.
- ERP Owner: I managed the different parts of the ERP as well as the integrations among the tools.

Some tools and technologies used:
 - Google Cloud Platform.
- Google Workspace.
- Zoho: Analytics, CRM, People, Projects, Recruit, etc.

Main responsibilities: 
- As project manager: dealing with clients, developing offers and solutions, managing projects and helping developers and juniors to reach their goals.
- As reference of BI and Analytics: I help junior consultants to learn analytical models and tools. Also I work with the Business Managers and architects to offer and design the best suitable solutions for our clients and projects. 
- As Corporate Data Manager: I am responsible for in-house analytics and reporting: I help managers, directors and C-Level to meet the most suitable KPIs and reports that help them in their daily work. I created the data model from the beginning and developed the ETL and the dashboards. That includes managing the ERP and all the data and information of the full company.

The projects I have developed and managed include the following technologies: 

- Cloud environment: Google (GCP) and Azure.
- Web development: HTML, CSS, Flask (Python)
- Data Science & Machine Learning: classification, computer vision, ...
- API: development and usage.
- Containers: Docker & Kubernetes
- Repositories: Gitlab / Github
- Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, BigQuery, ...
- Programming languages: Python, HTML, Markdown, JavaScript, Scala, ...
- BI Technologies: Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik Sense, ZOHO, Metabase, Grafana, Superset, ...

Apart from this, I design and print various objects in 3D printers for IoT projects.

Reporting (Copernicus Servicing):

Development and maintenance of business reports for the Risk Department of Banco Santander using SAP BO and SQL Oracle.
